forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this morning, a serene calm envelops the city as the sunlight teasingly dances across the skyline. Given the forecast, a canvas of mostly sunny skies will likely be punctuated by gentle breezes, whispering through the streets at 10 to 24 mph. The attire should lean towards a layered approach; a light jacket may offer comfort against the brisk gusts, particularly as afternoon temperatures wane towards the mid-sixties. 

Despite the clarity above, hints of the iconic marine layer loom, especially in the distance, where fog may cradle the Golden Gate, contributing to that inexplicable allure of San Francisco. As the day unfolds, seekers of quietude might find solace in a stroll through one of the numerous parks, or perhaps indulge in a leisurely coffee at a snug café while watching the world go by in an elegant cadence against the backdrop of vibrant city life.
